BIOG_MAIN.c_notes: Chai Chengwu [6] Jinshi # 1. Ancestors were Pingyang jun Chai(1). His great great grandfather, Geng [3003], moved to Caozhou, Jiyin xian during the Five Dynasties where his descendants created a distinguished lineage (zhuxing). He is also listed in Zhejiang TZ, 123.18a as a Quzhou, Jiangshan jinshi, which must mean that the Jiangshan Chai claim him as their Song ancestor. Zhao(1) Qi's [350] son-in-law. Qi's address is not known, but he may very well be a member of the Quzhou, Xian county Zhao lineage, which would explain the discrepancy in address. See documentation for Chai Tianxi [22956]. Daughter betrothed to Zhang(1) Taichu [7013]. HSSCGY, 1.3b; SHY:SH, 49.5b-6a; SS, 306.22a; Yang Yi, WJ, 10.9b-13b, 11.23b-26b. CBD 2, 1616.[Kinship with Youpeng is not yet checked. 與柴有朋的親戚關係未考。]
